org.springframework.web.reactive.config

类 DelegatingWebReactiveConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.web.reactive.config.WebReactiveConfigurationSupport
      • org.springframework.web.reactive.config.DelegatingWebReactiveConfiguration
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware

    @Configuration
public class DelegatingWebReactiveConfiguration
extends WebReactiveConfigurationSupport
    A subclass of WebReactiveConfigurationSupport that detects and delegates to all beans of type WebReactiveConfigurer allowing them to customize the configuration provided by WebReactiveConfigurationSupport. This is the class actually imported by @EnableWebReactive.
    从以下版本开始:
    5.0
    作者:
    Brian Clozel

      • configureMessageReaders

        protected void configureMessageReaders(List<org.springframework.http.codec.HttpMessageReader<?>> messageReaders)
        从类复制的说明: WebReactiveConfigurationSupport
        Override to configure the message readers to use for decoding controller method arguments.

        If no message readres are specified, default will be added via WebReactiveConfigurationSupport.addDefaultHttpMessageReaders(java.util.List<org.springframework.http.codec.HttpMessageReader<?>>).

        覆盖:
        configureMessageReaders 在类中 WebReactiveConfigurationSupport
        参数:
        messageReaders - a list to add message readers to, initially an empty
